checkboxKFieldRenderControl.description: If checked, the user must change their password when they next logon.

checkboxKFieldRenderControl.description: If checked, the password never expires.

dateAndTimeKFieldRenderControl.description: The date and time that a user account was last logged on.

dateAndTimeKFieldRenderControl.description: The date and time that a user account was last locked out.

numericKFieldRenderControl.description: The number of times a user account has been unsuccessfully logged on.

dateAndTimeKFieldRenderControl.description: The date and time that the password for a user account was last changed.
